segments.text: Hi , Cindy . I thought I ’ d missed you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I am very sorry , Hans . Thank you for waiting for me . You must have been here a long time already .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was caught in the heavy rain , or I would have come earlier . I am sorry I kept you waiting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was in a comfortable place , so really , it ’ s no problem . I am happy to see you . Did the rain hold you up long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . When I came out of the subway , it was raining cats and dogs . And I forgot my umbrella . So I had to wait for the rain to let up .
segments.speaker: S2
